ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: (OT) Tech problem, any suggestions?
ygData.msgSnippet: i like formatting myself.  i have a zipplus drive and can reinstall my OS, EQ, all my programs etc. in a few hours.  i hate doing it but if i have to i ll just
ygData.messageBody:
i like formatting myself. i have a zipplus drive and can reinstall my OS,
EQ, all my programs etc. in a few hours. i hate doing it but if i have to
i'll just reformat.

Shada


> I really shudder when I hear people recommend that you
> reformat your drive
> to install a new OS. Sure, if the drive's data is totally
> trashed, that may
> be the way to go. But if you would end up losing tons of data by
> reformatting (and honestly, how many people actually have a
> backup device
> other than their floppy drives at home???) the easiest way to
> do a fresh OS
> install is just to rename the Windows and Program Files directories.
